version_description:
Worldwide release.

- Added practice mode with realtime feedback - no cables needed!
- The app is now available in +20 languages!
- New and improved sheet music rendering engine. 
- Added more songs.
- Improved AR Mode and keyboard detection.

- Added support for iOS 14
- Added Environment Occlusion in AR mode for the new iPad Pro: Now your real piano will occlude the virtual pianist for even better immersive and realistic experience!
- Added support for Human and Hand Occlusion in AR mode
- Fixed an issue where the keyboard is invisible in AR mode in the non-english version of the app
- Improved UI

The ability to learn any song is finally here! Let AR Pianist listen to a piano song and it will create a piano lesson & a virtual concert for you using AI. 

- The ability to delete imported piano songs
- 20 New songs added
- Bug fixes and improvements
